author: Maria Akram
text:
When DM Sanjay Kumar cross-examined Amarjeet Singh of G4S, he couldn’t even recognize Umar Khalid from the video. “I played the exact video where he (Amarjeet) claimed to have heard Umar Khalid raising these slogans. But I kept the video mute. First, he could not indentify where Umar Khalid was standing in the crowd though video was from the same angle and distance from where Amarjeet has claimed to have clearly seen and heard Umar Khalid.”

But Amarjeet, even after this point, stood his ground and claimed he heard Umar Khalid raising slogans. “When I played the audio, none of the words Amarjeet attributed to Khalid were spoken at that moment. He retracted his statement.”

The third official, V.P. Yadav, had earlier told the internal committee that he had himself heard Kanhaiya giving anti-national speech at Ganga Dhaba. “But when I cross examined him, he said that he didn’t go near Ganga Dhaba. He also changed his statement,” the report said.
title: Security officials retracted
